summary: Five contract workers have taken on the task of tracking a huge old sanatorium for hazardous waste before demolishing. They realize that the job is more than a search for asbestos and mercury. The enormous building has much darker secrets.
cast: Ellen Dorrit Petersen|Anders Baasmo Christiansen|Tomas Norström|Baard Owe|Mads Sjøgård Pettersen|Renate Reinsve|Torstein Løning|Éva Magyar|Emese Nyírö|Márk Márfi|Szabolcs Szalay
title: Villmark 2
